extension_description.message: Custom Stadia avatars for you and your friends
extension_description.description: Short summary of this extension's function.

avatar_set.description: List of different options to set a users's avatar

avatar_set_url_support.message: Image should be at least 100x100px for best clarity across Stadia. URL must link directly to an image resource of type WebP, AVIF, PNG, APNG, GIF or JPG/JPEG.

page_return.description: Tooltip when hovering the back button on a page
